mapper.select: SELECT Q.NO,Q.CATE_NO,C.NAME as CATE_NAME,Q.TITLE,Q.ENROLL_DATE ,M.NICK AS WRITER FROM QUESTION_BOARD Q JOIN COMMON_CATEGORY C ON Q.CATE_NO= C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = Q.WRITER WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY Q.ENROLL_DATE DESC
SELECT M.NICK AS WRITER ,Q.ENROLL_DATE,C.NAME AS CATE_NAME,Q.TITLE,Q.CONTENT FROM QUESTION_BOARD Q JOIN COMMON_CATEGORY C ON Q.CATE_NO= C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = Q.WRITER WHERE Q.NO = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE QUESTION_BOARD SET DELETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE NO = ${no};
